text: Wanda Maria Chotomska (26 October 1929 - 2 August 2017) was a Polish children's writer, screenwriter and poet. She was born in Warsaw. She was known for being the screenwriter of the Jacek i Agatka television series. Her poems include: Wiersze pod psem (1959), Siedem księżyców (1970), Tańce polskie (1981), Kram z literami (1987), Wiersze dla dzieci (1997), and Wanda Chotomska dla najmłodszych (2000). Chotomska died in Warsaw on 2 August 2017 at the age of 87.Nie żyje Wanda Chotomska.
